definition: Saying is one thing, doing quite another (idiom)
pinyin: shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4
containing_words.word: 说是一回事，做又是另外一回事

definition: see 說是一回事，做又是另外一回事|说是一回事，做又是另外一回事[shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4]
pinyin: shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , er2 zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4
containing_words.word: 说是一回事，而做又是另外一回事

sentences.english: What is more, we have other two factories which are in Shanghai and Suzhou in China to supply the local market.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在上海和苏州也有设厂，以供应当地市场为主。

sentences.english: The subject of any other monograph must comply throughout its period of use.
sentences.chinese: 任何另外的专论的内容必须遵守其使用周期。

sentences.english: And always grouper and snapper," he added.
sentences.chinese: 另外还有始终供应的石斑鱼与红鳍笛鲷鱼。

sentences.english: Concertos are generally in three movements.
sentences.chinese: 协奏曲是另外一种类型。

sentences.english: Twelve others excluded him, and four abstained.
sentences.chinese: 另外十二位把他排除了，而四位弃权。

sentences.english: In addition, the definition for twisted-pair is different in different network standard.
sentences.chinese: 另外，不同网络标准中对双绞线线脚定义也是不同的。

sentences.english: In addition, rutin had the effect of raising the platelet count.
sentences.chinese: 另外，芦丁具有增加小鼠血小板总数的作用。

sentences.english: Two golden curves across the card surface add an artistic touch to the design.
sentences.chinese: 另外卡面设计以两道金色弧线为主题，极富艺术感。

sentences.english: The other thing to realize is that all writers think they suck.
sentences.chinese: 另外一个要认识的事情是所有作家认为他们有所得。

sentences.english: Furthermore, little effort has been devoted to the investigation of the function of fictive motion.
sentences.chinese: 另外，对虚拟运动作用的研究也没有继续深化。

sentences.english: Thenceforth, M. Madeleine was transfigured in Fantine's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 从此马德兰先生在芳汀的心目中是另外一个人了。

sentences.english: Additionally, the defendant may file a counter - claim (or cross- claim) to assert the defendant's own claims against the plaintiff.
sentences.chinese: 另外，被告可以递交反诉状来向原告主张自己的权利。

sentences.english: In addition, AACM is now in the process of drafting safety regulations.
sentences.chinese: 另外，民航局现正为安全法规进行法律草拟。

sentences.english: I also like that the tech is supposed to be durable, reducing e-waste.
sentences.chinese: 另外，这项技术是可持续耐用的，能减少电损耗。

sentences.english: For an extra dose of antioxidants, have a glass of red wine on the side.
sentences.chinese: 为了一个额外分量的抗氧化剂，另外再加一杯红酒。

sentences.english: Another 9-year old girl died after being admitted to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 另外一名年仅9岁的小女孩在被送入医院后不治。

definition: apart from this/in addition to this
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
